sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Interstate Rail Compact Act.

sections.heading: (A) The Interstate High Speed Intercity Rail Passenger Network
sections.text:
Compact is hereby enacted into law and entered into with all other jurisdictions
legally joining therein in form substantially as follows:Interstate High Speed IntercityRail Passenger Network CompactArticle I. POLICY AND PURPOSE
